title: S14 Ep50: An American Nightmare
itunes:title: An American Nightmare
description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS has An American Nightmare with reporters Meghan Cloherty & Jack Moore.

It was a case nightmares are made of. A Washington D.C. power couple, their 10-year-old son and housekeeper held hostage for nearly 24 hours and murdered inside a burning D.C. mansion. WTOP reporters examine the complicated trail of evidence that police say led to finding their killer and why they say he committed such a brutal crime.

Subscribe now to 22 Hours:
https://www.podcastone.com/22-hours-an-american-nightmare
